channel.title: Data Science on Jameson Thai
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Jameson Thai

item.title: Data Science Intern
item.description: Developed Python image identification pipeline and model for identifying DC Universe characters in a given DCU comic page. Built Xception Convolutional Neural Network in Keras framework while training model on AWS EC2 instance. Present project architecture and convolutional neural network model’s layer activation to WB executive, data intelligence team, and DCU stakeholders.
